sentence: The image appears to be a screenshot of a mobile application interface titled "Love Quotes."
sentence_cn: 该图片似乎是一款名为“爱情语录”的手机应用程序界面的截图。

sentence: 1. Header: The top bar shows the title "Love Quotes" with an image thumbnail on the left.
sentence_cn: 1. 标题：顶部栏显示标题“爱情语录”，左侧显示图片缩略图。

sentence: System icons for notifications, battery, time (12:28), and other typical status indicators are at the top.
sentence_cn: 通知、电池、时间（12:28）和其他典型状态指示器的系统图标位于顶部。

sentence: 2. Main Content: Below the header is a section with an image containing a love quote.
sentence_cn: 2. 主要内容：标题下方是包含爱情名言的图片部分。

sentence: The quote reads, "Sometimes your nearness takes my breath away and all the things I want to say can find no voice.
sentence_cn: 歌词写道：“有时你的靠近让我无法呼吸，所有我想说的话都无法用言语表达。

sentence: Then in silence, I can only hope my eyes will speak my heart."
sentence_cn: 然后在沉默中，我只希望我的眼睛能说出我的心声。”

sentence: 3. Options: Below the image are four clickable options:
sentence_cn: 3. 选项：图片下方有四个可点击的选项：

sentence: - Send To Friend: Represented by an icon of a person with an arrow.
sentence_cn: - 发送给朋友：用一个带有箭头的人形图标表示。

sentence: - Rate Application: Illustrated by a star icon.
sentence_cn: - 评分应用：以星形图标表示。

sentence: - Send Feedback: Shown with a feedback box icon.
sentence_cn: - 发送反馈：显示反馈框图标。

sentence: - Our Work: Displayed with a briefcase icon.
sentence_cn: - 我们的工作：以公文包图标显示。

sentence: 4. Exit Button: At the bottom, an orange bar with the word "Exit" allows users to close the application.
sentence_cn: 4. 退出按钮：在底部，一个带有“退出”字样的橙色条允许用户关闭应用程序。
